verbose_text: Compared with the nanovehicle lacking the r9 peptide (CN), r9-CN exhibits long retention and deep penetration in the tumor mass, and considerably enhances accumulation and flexible permeation in metastatic lymph nodes, thereby notably suppressing primary tumor growth, lymph node metastasis, and distant lung metastasis.
evidence: r9-CN exhibits long retention and deep penetration in the tumor mass, and considerably enhances accumulation and flexible permeation in metastatic lymph nodes, thereby notably suppressing primary tumor growth, lymph node metastasis, and distant lung metastasis
